means: [医]竹芋属：热带草本植物之一属，有几种的根可产淀粉，供作撒布粉和润滑药

derivation.yuyuan_name: modern Latin, named after Bartollomeo Maranta, 16th-cent. Italian herbalist

means.word_mean: 1. any of numerous herbs of the genus Maranta having tuberous starchy roots and large sheathing leaves
